clinical_history: Follow-up PET-CT after chemotherapy to assess treatment response.
findings: Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in cervical lymph nodes, suggestive of malignancy.
Physiologic uptake observed in brain, myocardium, and urinary tract.
Multiple hypermetabolic lesions in bones, suggestive of metastases.
Mild inflammatory uptake in cervical lymph nodes region.
recommendations: Consider lab tests to assess metabolic activity if indicated.
